title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1760.6 - Standards for loan documents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1760.6 - Standards for loan documents

State Regulations

In reviewing the loan documents, the division may
consider various factors, including but not limited to the fact that
they: (a) provide sufficient notice to
the parties to the transaction and their successors and assigns that the
housing company is supervised by the division and subject to the private
housing finance law and regulations; (b) do not conflict with any provision of the
private housing finance law or regulations; (c) are not unfair or unduly burdensome to
the housing company; (d) clearly
reflect any modifications of the division's supervisory role; (e) do not affect the division's authority to
supervise the housing company except to the extent consented to by the
division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1760.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
